The hotel is absolutely fantastic. The gym is great and the staffs are very courteous and friendly. The breakfast area is large with a great variety and lots of stuff you can try.  Definitely a must visit

Best bell desk in Cairo.  Sherif was so helpful and kind; he'll sort out anything you'd like with a smiling face and the typical Egyptian hospitality.   Other than the temporary roadworks around, the experience was fine.

Restaurant Chinoix. Good chinese food, fresh vegetables and tasty. Excellent service. Delicious jasmine tea. Nice atmosphere. Good portions. Recommended for people who enjoys good quality. It is a restaurant inside the hotel. So, it is quite convenient.

Update*** management contacted me and expressed their concern and assured everything will be rectified. Amazing response by management staff....I will continue my stay here as management seem to truly care about the guests.

We had a wonderful experience at the Renaissance Cairo Mirage City Hotel has a perfect location.  The staff at this property are all great! They all go above and beyond to make our stay very comfortable.   Special Thanks to Mr. Ahmed Assad Abdel Aziz who make all our stay very enjoyable. Everything in the hotel exceeded all expectations.

Stayed at this hotel and had a lovely dinner at the Chinese restaurant - Great food, great ambiance and great service!! Amir and the Youssef had excellent service. I would go to this restaurant again. Thank you very much!! And cheers to a great trip in Cairo.

We had a business brunch at the renaissance hotel. Everything was perfect from the organization to the food quality and amazing service. The location is excellent and the venue was cheerful‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.,‚Ä¶,,,,,.,

My marriage was 2 days ago and i would really thank everyone in the hotel on the organization, dedication, hospitality 'everything  My marriage went exactly as i and my wife planned, litterely no mistakes made.  The stuff is well organized and friendly.  The food was beyond the expectations.  No words can ever fulfill my satisfaction,  Special thanks to MR. Shady for his efforts who supervised every single detail by him self and didn't want to leave till late night to make sure everything is going well for me  I really recommend this hotel to all the Egyptians and non Egyptians

I have spent the last couple of days in triumph plaza hotel, i can say i enjoyed my stay there, the staff is so friendly and helpful, room was clean and comfortabl, hotel location is perfect and the area is quiet. This was my second stay in triumph plaza hotel and for sure i would repeat it again.

Great hotel accommodation with nice-receptionist staff especially gayed and others service people .. everything is great .. hygen food and communication.. I will come  here again hopping you to maintain your quality

we are very pleased to conduct our workshops their. Great team ,Excellent Management starting from the Reservation Team (especially Mrs Marian ) to the Banquet Team and Operation Team (especially Mrs Demiana   - Mr. Karim - Mr.Ahmed Abdelaty Mr.Mohamed Mahmoud-Mr.Omar) all of them are very helpful we mostly enjoyed the hospitality . overall, the Hotel is cozy  with friendly staff

Good hotel very nice and cooperative stuff, special thanks to the guest relations manager miss Gihaan. Great thanks to the front office staff day shift on there effort  The breakfast buffet was excellent  I had the lunch in Lebanon restaurant  The food was great

The staff is extremely hospital and gentle, they are helpful and considerable. Room service are highly qualified, and the reception staff are highly trained and their communication is very helpful. ....

Staff very helpful ,excellent  service,  verygood atmosphere & excellent band music, very clean and calm Era  High menu with lot varieties & tasty foods, good prices,  Special thanks for master Ahmed alaam

Staff are extraordinary helpful and professional . Front desk was very professional they try to make sure that every thing is OK with every single guest . The hotel is cozy as if u where in home . Thanks to all staff

Very good management and excellent treatment from the operation and a distinctive and spacious hall. As for break and lunch, they are very good in terms of quantity and quality. Special thanks to the reservation department, especially Ms. Aya

The stay at the hotel was decent for the paid price. The hotel is located at the heart of Cairo and moving around was easy. We mostly enjoyed the hospitality and staff, especially Ibrahim at the front reception, and Mina and Samira at the 4th floor lounge. I would stay here again!

Great hospitality and comfort, about restaurant diversity of all delicious foods, Great Pool view, gym is good, Staff are amazing, MR. Fady Atef is very helpful person, Really enjoyed and I will come again soon with my family.  Wishing for you all the best.

It has been the first visit to this tremendously luxurious Hotel . It 's new  with great reception , many seating areas with charming d√©cor all around . Rooms are too spacious  modernly furnished though beds are not that wide . Bathroom is exceptionally designed and very spacious as well . Pavilion restaurant provides high quality breakfast , welcoming staff .. Kids area available with few options, needs maintenance and upgrade .

Went to Triumph hotel and was amazed and surprised by the service everything was perfect, Stuff is absolutely professional especially Mohamed Sabry met him in different situations and restaurants and was always keen to make sure that the service food and quality is up to the standards without me even commenting, Thank you Triumph stuff Thank you Mohamed Sabry

Every little detail there reflects luxury, relaxation and comfort. Location is brilliant, and the food was so good.  Staff there were very friendly and welcoming, especially Ghadir & Khalid at the reception‚Äîthey were just exceptional.  A true gateway to treat yourself ‚Äî couldn‚Äôt get any better.   Would definitely go there again.

It was the  first time to have our business workshop at Triumph Luxury hotel and for sure will not be the last time, i was really surprised with the first class services the staff able to provide to our guests, flexiblity can be considered brilliant. I really was happy dealing with such wonderful staff at the hotel, especial thanks to one of the best staff I have ever seen in hotels Ahmed Abdel Rehim, handsome. Professional. Respectable and quick responded to whatever you need. Again thanks.and let's hope we meet again. Hesham Younis.

Excellent hospitality, very friendly receptionists , excellent food quality, excellent housekeeping, excellent room , 3 minutes to check in which is wonderful üëç, i have enjoyed my stay where no noise at all , will visit you again and i have delivered a very good message to my company about your Wonderful Hotel which deserve 10 starts  Thanks HS

Everything was perfect and smooth and the service was good, the staff were professional and the food is great. The room is clean and orgnized and the housekeeping was helpful. Nothing bad I face in the stay at all and the location is fantastic

Great hospitality and comfort, location is near of all entertainment visits, about restaurant diversity of all delicious foods, Great Pool view,gym is good, Staff are amazing, Really enjoyed and I will come again soon with my family

I had a great experience with my family; my accommodation was a mixed stay between work, tourism, and sightseeing for my family; I enjoyed the hotel atmosphere and welcoming staff for five days.  The hotel premises are fantastic; the food is more than excellent.

I always enjoyed my stay in Triumph new cairo , kindly staff , beautiful quite place to  stay, spaecial thanks to Mr.Ahmed Attrees and Mr.mohaned Shoukry for the great hospitality level and excellent services in breakfast .üëç

excellent food and wonderful service.  The pane vino restaurant was delicious and our waiter Adel rahman was helpful, friendly and very efficient.  We found the price is very reasonable and the view was great. This is a must place to eat if you‚Äôre in this area

Hotel location is good. Walking distance to a couple of tourist spots in downtown Cairo. Breakfast is nice. House keeping guy Taha on 15th floor is very nice and helpful. Good place for long stay. Safe and comfortable.

GATE 1 arranged this luxurious hotel for our Cairo stay ! It was an amazing experience, very friendly, hospitable , comfortable, efficient! The breakfast was fantastic ; views from rooms of either the Nile or Tahrir square were simply magnificent!  The luggages , check ins, check outs of ALL 57 of us were handled seemlessly by GATE 1 ! The buses were new, with WIFI and charge ports in every seat ! The drivers were  friendly and professional too ..,  THREE CHEERS to GUDES RIHAM, NEHAL and our driver ZACHARIYA! üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº  The restaurants were fabulous too , especially the Indian  and Thai ones !

Great Hotel with Solid Service. Especially the receptionist Yasser helped me and my mom book a reservation at the Revolving Restaurant & we had an amazing date and ambience over there which we really enjoyed.   Highly recommend and especially letting our dear friend Yasser do all the bookings, tours and reservations for you !

‚Ä¶.. that there was a time, before retirement, when the Intercon group was my very favourite and I enjoyed their highest status of Royal Ambassador ‚Ä¶ but these days I travel using my own money but still choose this brand when I am able to. The receptionist smiled when he found my card had lapsed some 14 years ago but my smiling request for a Nile view room was ignored as he is clearly not able to use his discretion for ‚Äúold friends‚Äù!! He did however offer my a rate on the daily breakfast that my agent had not sort to include in my booking ‚Ä¶. a good guy who went the extra mile!  Breakfast is a Bun Fight in the In and Out Cafe!! The receptionist very organised and one of the staff named Omnia a service ‚Äústar‚Äù ‚Ä¶ the perfect staff member that we dearly loved to have in the days when I ran hotels myself  The breakfast restaurant clearly lacks organisation ‚Ä¶ in my four days here they have never ever managed to have sufficient fruit juices available to meet demand ‚Ä¶ it is a crying shame! The price charged for breakfast is substantial and the food offering and general service does not reflect that  We have also had a meal in the lobby cafe each evening of our stay ‚Ä¶ and here we see classic Egyptian management at work! When I opened restaurants in Egypt we found that one of the major hurdles was to teach managment to be proactive in quickly addressing guests needs and not expecting staff to do everything ‚Ä¶. I am easy on service because I understand but having to approach service staff and demand attention or serve myself my own drinks means that I have had enough!  I like this hotel and will return ‚Ä¶ it is so very easy to get to anywhere in Cairo and the Bell Captains help in securing me local taxi was everything as it should be. The front door service, reception desk and Omnia deserve full recognition!!!  Final Question? ‚Ä¶.. why is the same sandwich served three different ways in three days ‚Ä¶ the F&B director needs to question why standards are not being followed‚Ä¶

We stayed , I and my wife, in Semiramis intercontinental Cairo, for 16 nights from 19/10/2022 to 4/11/2022. It was , as always, a wonderful experience . The reception was very courteous , we were upgraded to a stunning suite, the ladies in the executive lounge looked after us very well. The food was of wonderful variety..this is my 11th year of staying in Semiramis , will never stay anywhere else, in fact we , already, booked our trip for next year. I would like to thank Karim Zereef who helped us enormously, thanks to Mena  in the front desk, the ladies in the lounge, Mena, Hidi, Reem, Nermin . Thanks to Amanny, Waleed, Mehmood, Muhammed, Abu Zaid and the rest. Thanks , once again, to all of you who made our stay so nice and pleasurable‚Ä¶ See you, all, next year!! Najim Ghulam and Hala Safari‚Ä¶

My wife and I stayed here two nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Very good location and attentive staff.  Our room was large, bed very comfortable and we enjoyed sitting on little deck over looking the Nile and the city.  The dinner and breakfast buffet was extensive, food well prepared and there was room for people to move around without banging into each other.  All in all a very nice stay and we would recommend.

The worst reception and service I have ever had in a so-called 5-star hotel. No recognition of my Ambassador status. Disorganized check-in and check-out. They gave me a room that was not ready yet. The terrace bar of the hotel is simply dirty. The management of this hotel should be ashamed of the quality of the respect given to the customers. IHG should audit this hotel thoroughly.

I‚Äôve been to over thirty  intercontinentales, and as a royal ambassador I can say this was one of the top one or two. The hotel is remodeled, the staff (especially Haremos and Waleed in the club lounge) were very attentive and friendly.   The ambassador club is also one of the best I‚Äôve seen, out of all the intercontinentales I‚Äôve visited. Only the one in Seoul is of the same caliber.   The location is perfect, right on the Nile and next door to the museum.

Booking and staff are very good and friendly.  THE ROOMS ARE A BIT TIRED,  Doors does not close properly. They are very old and they have not been modernised.  The views are great overlooking the Nile and I could see the pyramids from my balcony.  Breakfast was good, but it was very busy and doesn't feel like a personal experience.  Some of the staff are stressed and some are pleasant.  Reception staff are good and helpful.  We had a room which was next to the lift shaft.  This room was very noisy all night and I had to fight to get it changed.  Overall, the experience is good but not excellent.

first of all I would like to mention Mr Amir, the director of this hotel, because he is one of the nicest persons I ever met, he tries his best to help and make you feel welcome. All the people in general are extremely nice and helpful but he is much more. The hotel is not in the centre but it is only 20min far from the airport and it is in direct communication through the garage to the Citystars shopping centre, the biggest of Egypt. Thanks to this, you do not have to take a taxi to go to any restaurant, as inside the Citystars there is a wide choice of high level restaurants with very high ratings in Tripadvisor as well. Being the Staybridge the same family of Intercontinental, from the shopping centre you also have direct access to this other hotel where there are other excellent restaurants. Prices of restaurants are also much cheaper than staying anywhere else in the centre. In any tourist area prices are at least double. I did not give 5 stars because they need to improve breakfast service and quality. All the rest is really excellent, rooms are big, very confortable, very clean, they leave bottles of water every day, laundry is for free, beds are very confortable. Wifi works perfect. There is no swimming pool while the gym is very good. There is nothing outside the hotel and the area is not nice, but it is the standard in Cairo, as pollution and traffic are terrible, and quality of the buildings is extremely poor. The hotel is a gem in the area. The shopping centre closes at late night therefore in case of any need you find anything in there‚Ä¶

The hotel is very clean and quiet and have excellent location with direct access to the city stars mall which contains all sort of shopping, dinning and fun places. The food served in the included breakfast was very good as well with good variety and options to dine in the restaurant or the room.

Great experience thanks to a wonderful staff. Shady and Muhammad Abdullah at the front desk remember you and your room number throughout the stay. Very helpful. Rehab and Nagwa run the restaurant with caring and efficiency. Suites are as big as my first condo. Two caveats: 1, there is no pool. You can walk through the lovely Intercontinental pool area (sister hotel next door) but you can‚Äôt use it. 2, no dedicated tour desk. The front desk staff will help arrange anything you request, though!    The hotel is connected to an upscale mall with gourmet grocery store, theaters, and tons of restaurants.

I came to Egypt and found out about an event called Ramadan. Ramadan is a very important and sacred event for Egyptians. I am currently staying at Staybridge. The staff at Staybridge will give me great support as a foreigner. During Ramadan, the staff provided me with a comfortable room. I am deeply grateful to Miss.Asmaa and Mr.Amir. PS Staff Abdelrahman, Mina, Salah, Nagwa, Rehab, Adel, Tarek, Michael‚Ä¶ The staff are all wonderful people. Service is perfect.. the view from my room fantastic  thank you Staybridge and the   team is freindely and politely special Miss Asmaa Elhadary  and Mr. Amir Mahmoud   from the reception exceeded my expectations

We stayed at this hotel in October 2021 for 12 nights. From the first moment of our arrival ,we felt the exceptional customer service. Mr. Mohammed Abd Allah the front desk manager who met us did an excellent job trying to accommodate our need.  The room was excellent,  breakfast was great and lots of varieties and the location of the hotel was superb being in city star itself.   I would give 5 stars for all the friendly employees for their excellent customer service trying to do all they can so you can enjoy your stay . I really would stay there again whenever I visit Cairo.

Service is perfect.. the view from my room fantastic üòç thank you kempinski and the team is freindely and politely special Mariam from geust relation and ahmed from the reception and mohamed from conserige

I booked 2 rooms at the hotel last week, and I truly enjoyed a remarkable experience from checking-in till departure! The hotel exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this hotel for: 1) Great, friendly staff. 2) Spacious, fully-equipped rooms. 3) Exceptional sense of security. 4) Location & direct access to city stars mall. It's the best choice for Families and travelers who appreciate the 'Home, away from home experience'

This is our third stay at this amazing hotel. We stayed in suite 1012 between 24/09/2021 - 08/10/2021. The hotel in general is beautiful and suites are specious, clean and beds are extremely comfy. I also loved the view from our room. The staff are friendly and I must say special thanks to (Michael) who works in the reservation department "thank you for your time and gracious hospitality. Thanks again for doing everything you could to make us feel at home and thank you for going the extra mile for us I really appreciate your efforts and can't thank you enough" .  I must also say special thanks to (Bahaa) (housekeeping manager) for being so generous and helpful. He looked after us very well during our stay :)  A Big thank you to (Rehab) for preparing a decent breakfast for us every morning, she was extremely generous, I can't thank her enough for looking after us during our stay as this made our stay unforgettable.  Thanks to everyone else for the warm welcome. Hotel facilities are superb.  I highly recommend this fantastic hotel.‚Ä¶

Nice place! Super super helpful staff even with my language limited to English only. I never made it to breakfast but it was nice to just pop over to the mall via the parking garage when I needed to. Bathroom a little small but there is the kitchen etc so that explains why. Overall good stay.

It is my first time for me here .I‚Äôm diamond elite member with IHG but really like this hotel .like the hospitality here from all the staff special Mr.Hamdy from reception and Mrs.Rasha the Guest Relations Manager for all their effort that they provided to me .Hopfully the hotel provides club lounge for IHG members as the hotel is different than other Holiday inn.Will come again in June .

Eman is really nice and polite, in general all the staff  from the Hotel  and the most amazing is the view that is direct to the Nile.  I really recommend to look the sunset at the pool area because it's amazing. this Hotel have many  amenities like Casino and bar  in the building. Neben the hotel are many pharmacies and supermarket if you need to buy  something for emergencies.

This hotel is clean, has many delicious meal options and friendly staff.  Marina, the Client Service Representative, was extremely helpful.  She scheduled tours for us, everything was easy and flawless.  Thank you!

As usual an excellent stay (ongoing for another 10 days) staying in the IHG Holiday Inn suites in Maadi Cairo.   Food is excellent, internet excellent, beds very comfy, all in a very nice place to be for work or personnel break.   Invited to the hotel weekly reception gathering and met the very professional and informative guest relations team.   Stayed here many times including all other IHG brands / hotels globally.   Excellent service, very friendly, and excellent IHG members program  My go to brand for hotels and myself and colleagues will continue to use IHG

Organized to spend an extra night here so we could have some time by the pool. They slipped a note under the door in the night saying the pool and gym would be closed all day for a private function. When asked if  they could shuttle us to the other holiday inn, they declined. The hotel itself was otherwise nice but we wouldn‚Äôt have stayed here if we had known earlier.

Food tasted very nice and the service of the waiters was more than perfect,very cosy place Thanks to amro and alaa eldin for the good welcoming Thanks for all the staff Will definetly visit again Perfectooooooüòçüòçüòç
Room service & housekeeping was helpful very clean & organised  Special thanks for  Remonda & iman organising resorption event  Place was great  It will not the last time isa  Stuff was kind and help

The hotel is located in a very beautiful place in Maadi, looking at the Nile. The staff were so kind and hospitable, they offered me a VIP room, and always takes care of my needs. Salut to the ladies of the guest relations they are more than kind!

I stayed at 6th floor at the hotel for 6 days . I came for a workshop . I wanna recommend waleed as room attendants . I lost my gold ring in the room. He found it in the room and left it to me in a visible place . That was amazing !

The hole staff is very friendly and very hospitable.  Rasha , The Guest relation manger is very friendly and caring.  She Called us to check on us and asking how the room is . The location of the hotel is very good and close to the center of Cairo I‚Äôm recommending this hotel to my all my friends

My girlfriend and I had a massage with Salma and Mohanad today at this place and we enjoyed our experience. They were both very professional and provided great service. Highly recommend if you are looking to relax! The massages were also very complete and for the full body.

I think this Hilton is the best one in Cairo at the moment. They take the Corona situation very serious (although quite some guests unfortunately don‚Äôt). The staff tries to enter the room as few times as possible. But if needed housekeeping can be requested.  Also because of Covid, guests that book a room with breakfast (or have it included) have a choice between room service or breakfast in the restaurant. There are no limitations on the breakfast options. The roomservice menu (dinner/ lunch) still has many options (more than other Hilton hotels worldwide during this pandemic). Rooms do have a classic interior, but all is really well maintained. The pool is located on the bank of the Nile, the only downside can be that it is sunny until around 1pm. I love the location in Zamalek, which is an area I like to wander around. The icing on the cake is the very friendly and helpful staff‚Ä¶. I can recommend this hotel fully and can‚Äôt wait to return here.‚Ä¶

We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights as part of a tour.  The hotel lobby, coffee shop, outdoor pool and location were great. The morning buffet breakfast was excellent and the staff friendly and helpful.  However, the rooms are extremely old and dated. Additionally, they have not been maintained. On the first night, water from the bathroom above our room leaked and flooded our bathroom. The room balcony which had a fantastic view of the Nile was unusable as it hadn't been maintained and dirty.  I would still stay at this hotel due to the location, amenities and staff.

Charming hotel located perfectly at the Nile. Amazing view and located in the heart of the vibrant neighborhood of zamalek. The rooms are nice and clean. The breakfast is very good with a great variety of food, international and Egyptian. The staff is friendly and helpful and attentive. The staff at the reception is very kind and professional, we were helped by Moustafa who is a great asset to this hotel! We will definitely come back, we already booked our next stay with the whole family for next February!

W·∫π have stayed 4 nights in Hilton zemalek Cairo, Hotel staffs ar·∫π Very polite and well beheaved.   Hotel food is Very good. Also rooms and room service.   This hotel is next to Nile river. W·∫π can see the rever view from the hotel balcony.  Over all good place to stay here.

Seriously had the best massage with Mariam. She has magic hands. I was in a car accident two weeks ago and was in so much pain and stiff and she was so gentle and worked through it all and is the first time I felt relief since it happened. My husband had his massage with Ramy and he felt soooo much better. He has back issues as well and Ramy was nice and strong working through it all. 10/10 Definitely book your massage you won‚Äôt regret it. We are booking another one in a couple days üôÇ

Great service and food quality and taste. Clean pleace with a great view to the Nile River and Hotel pool. The hotel haa an International Updated Environment. The Personel crew are profesional and very commited to attend their clients under the manager supervision.

The hotel is very comfortable, beautiful and in a excellent location. The food is excellent and the staff extremely helpful and kind. It was a pleasant experience. Safety is also a important aspect of this hotel.

The location is nice, but very very busy as it‚Äôs in the middle of diplomatic area. Lovely view over the Nile from the rooms and gym.  The rooms are huge! 2 bedrooms, kitchen and two bathrooms, ideal for families. This is a very old property so everything in the room is worn out, they try to maintain and clean but it‚Äôs old.  Great view from restaurant over the Nile

Excellent stay, the hotel staff couldn‚Äôt do enough for us and the breakfast is amazing (and thanks Mohammed for looking after us at breakfast ). Room was very clean and comfortable (thanks Fatima). View from our room of the Nike was great too. Pool is lovely too! We booked some private tours through the hotel, which were amazing; thanks Wagih (our guide), Ibrahim and Sayad for arranging everything, we had a fantastic time, saw incredible sights and learned a lot. And thanks Moustafa on the front desk for helping us with all our questions!

A very good experience and worth every day stay. The massage, fitness equipment and restaurants were great. A number of staff were very helpful. Among them is Alaa, Mostapha and Saber. I would recommend a stay in Conrad

I have stayed twice in July once before going to north cost and other after coming from north cost   For some reasons I made mistake in dates , they were so collaborative in fixing the date as per the right plan with no charge considering am diamond member   And as usual Conrad never turned me down in taking care of all the hygiene starting from the rooms, corridors and restaurants.  Breakfast is one of the things that i can‚Äôt missed during my staying in Conrad , the assortment is too good and always satisfying.  Mr.Gamal Yousry as his usual remembered me and my family members names , and welcome us back asking about our health status , also assure us that they are taking the highest precautions practices in all zones   Thanks again and always to Conrad hotel for making our first trip after the pandemic is so great   We always will come back and Conrad will always be out first choice‚Ä¶

A pleasant experience in Conrad. Excellent house keepers Saber & Alaa. Both folks would daily check on with me to ensure I am comfortable and have my room cleaned.   Another great folk is Mustafa. Walking into the hotel tired after a stressful trip. Mustapha lighten up my day with so much warmth, enthusiasm and interesting jokes. Such a good guy.

As a travel agent, I booked our group trip to Egypt and I'm glad we choose Conrad. Lucky for us, the hotel is almost complete with their renovations and as a result, our rooms were amazing.  The website does not do the hotel enough justice.   In addition to this, the hotel staff had great security around the clock, prompt room assistance, excellent restaurants with many different food options, and is overall reasonably priced.    I give them my best recommendation.

Our Road Scholar group ended our trip there.  It is a lovely hotel having  rooms with views of the Nile and a nice restaurant.  It is large so there is lots of room to wander and relax.  The management gave us a very late checkout without charge so we could catch a late flight to the US.  In the restaurant we were well taken care of by IMAN and the bell hop Ashfar made sure our Uber arrived on time and stayed with us until he arrived.

It was years ago that I visited the Conrad Hotel in Cairo and the recent visit was a very pleasent one. The Hotel was going to a major renovation and is surely making a very big uplift to the Hotel and the quality of the stay.  The staff are unusally friendly and accomedating and you get this special "I feel at home" vipe. It will surely be my preferred Hotel in Cairo when I plan to return shortly.

The best beds ever - didn't want to leave !  Great Food and Beverage and Moustafa at check ins as AMAZING !  Really appreciated the flowers in our room from Head of Housekeeping- Shereen and Nevine Albert made us so welcome on our arrival check in. THANK YOU !

Wonderful stay at conrad. Great location and lovely restaurants. Special thanks to Amr at Concierge, he was truly superb. Looked after us the whole stay. Arranged all our travel arrangements each morning and had our room upgraded when we had a small issue. He even went as far as calling the hotel we were booked at in sharm el sheikh to arrange for them to send a car to the airport to collect us as our transfer had failed. It seemed nothing was too much trouble. If you stay here please introduce yourselves to Amr as if there is anything that you need he will assist with a smile. You are a great ambassador for Conrad, thank you again Amr.

This was an amazing hotel. With amazing staff. The attention to detail throughout the hotel was fantastic. The housekeeping staff that was responsible for my room Saber and Laila were perfect and just a pleasure to see and talk to everyday. Very kind and helpful always asking if there was anything they could do for me. The hotel is in a great location and has amazing views. They have multiple restaurants, a bar/club, and a casino. I always felt welcomed and safe at the hotel. I will definitely stay here again if I should ever visit Cairo again in the future.

We have had a very enjoyable time here at the Conrad in Cairo a very comfortable place to spend our last few days here in Egypt  I would like to single out one person out of a whole lot of helpful and friendly staff. Ahmed Abdelhady was our breakfast waiter and could not have been more helpful. It felt as though we were the only people in the restaurant when in fact he was able to give everyone in the restaurant personal and excellent service. We certainly appreciated the friendly attention he gave us ensuring all our needs and more were met.

I have stayed at this hotel before It was so comfortable hotel and teamwork really really really helpful team . I loved this hotel so much so excellent front office, excellent restaurant,and excellent rooms Finally i would like to thank mr. Ramadan Youssef.

to the main resturant it was perfect as well as the cafe was good the staff was good also the pool was good indian resturant also was very good location malllVery nice hotel i spent my vacation there i went

The hotel is more than wonderful in Terms of cleanliness and other things. My experience in the main restaurant ‚Äúwindows‚Äù with breakfast is varied, delicious and fresh. The treatment of the staff is very hospitable and helpful. There is also a wonderful restaurant in the hotel devoted to Indian food ‚Äúindira‚Äù. This made me sensitive to the Indian dishes and their good flavor.  Spatial thanks to the front office team for the good reception and quick accommodations.

This hotel was very good in everything i liked the food it was delicious and amazing the buffet was perfect and the restaurant staff are smiling every time please keep on  rooms need some renovations  your perfect  job

One of the best hotels with the best hospitality, service and has one of the best locations in cairo.   I Loved my stay overthere and would definitely back in the near future. Room was so clean and food was really nice.

The hotel was perfect my stay was amazing i liked the hotel staff and the rooms were perfect swimming pool was clean and the staff was very helpful i will recommended this hotel to my friends and colleagues thank you for everything

Everything was good restaurant staff in the reception was good as well as the Indian restaurant staff was amazing the location near to mall also near to the airport the service was very good overall good üëç

the hotel is perfect for everything I liked the hotel staff specially the pool and gym and the front office team specially karim mohamed from concierge .the hotel location was perfect and very close to the mall and the Airport too ..

Have a lovely stay  Hotel stuff is very friendly Hotel is clean and rooms are big and clean The food in the restaurant is very tasty Great experience so i hope i came very soon  Great thankful for Mostafa and Micheal

I stayed there for business it was perfect, very close to the Airport, and the room it was very clean most key places in the city, and with a direct connection to the Mall. Thank you so much to all the team there; especially karim Mohamed AND Ramadan Youssif at the Concierge.  less

Amazing breakfast, the food is incredible and the buffet has a large variety of everything. The staff is so friendly and kind. Ask for Siham she‚Äôs super helpful and nice, she brought us everything we needed and even more.

I‚Äôve been staying at this hotel for years, so I know what to expect. This time I had multiple room bookings. Thanks to Ms. Marcelina, check-in was quick and flawless. IDs and special requests were sent one day before. Despite the hotel being very busy on the weekend, I got one room upgraded due to my Bonvoy status which is always welcome and a sign of appreciation from the Bonvoy group. Thanks Ms. Marcelina.   House keeping were always supporting and not late on our requests although they were many.   Thanks for Mr. Khalil from the swimming area for always setting up nice lounges in the shade close to each other as we were 10 people.   Room dining has improved significantly over the years. We ordered burger and chicken nuggets on multiple occasions. Always fresh with quality meat/ chicken. What you would expect from a 5 star hotel.   There was an evening wedding but due to the double glazed room windows, we couldn‚Äôt hear any sound inside the rooms.   Thank you for a great stay and looking forward to my next visit.‚Ä¶

My family and I had a wonderful stay at The Westin Cairo. The hotel has beautiful views overlooking a golf course as well as its own greenery. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The service in the hotel is first class; from the staff at breakfast (with special thanks to Aya, Seham and Amr), to the house keeping staff (special thanks to Mustafa and Muhammad), and everyone in reception (thank you Mark). I highly recommend this hotel.

I am a consistent guest to Westin Katameya dunes. I spend periods there for both family vacations and business events. It os a perfect place for both types of trips. Excellent Relaxing resort, very professional, friendly staff who thrives for guest satisfaction. Thanks to all Westin Katameya Dunes team with Special thanks to Marc and Abdelfattah

During my most recent business trip, I was impressed by the professionalism and amicability displayed by your staff members, as well as the quality of service provided, which convinced me that I can always rely on your hotel staff members. Mr. Amr Naguib and Mr. Mustafa deserve special thanks. Thank you very much!  Dr. Islam Nasralla

The place is great in terms of the green view, staff, and services, I like it very much and highly recommend it for relaxing breaks!! Kids also enjoyed too much and had a pleasant and funny stay.. The Westin Cairo Golf Resort is always our preferred choice in Cairo.

Fantastic stay at Westin hotel, loved the atmosphere and staff. Paloma was great, special thanks to Aya, welcoming lady. My daughter Alia promised to send her üíúüå∑. I strongly recommend it for honeymooners.

I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The views were amazing and the atmosphere made me feel at home. I was particularly impressed by how attentive the staff were. Special thanks go to Aya who greeted us with a wonderful smile when we went for breakfast. She made us feel special no matter how busy the restaurant want. I would like to thank her for her care and kindness. I can‚Äôt wait to visit her and her hotel again.

The space is very nice,  People are really kind. Mahmoud at restaurant presented me with very good sugestions, the last desert I've tried was amazing good. Every day the service was very good.  The lebanese grill is something you should definitely try.

This is a beautiful luxury hotel situated on the Nike River. My husband and I are here for a few days prior to our Nile river cruise. Staff is extremely helpful at the dining areas, rooftop pool or just in the lobby areas. If you look confused they jump Right in to ask how they can assist you.   Restaurants - Middle eastern restaurant on the BR level was excellent - we had chicken soup, pigeons stuffed with rice etc. pigeons were a nice surprised with very dark meat but nicely spiced. E had a couple of tajines - but was way too much food for even the four of us.  SUGGESTION - Disclosing the portion size at ordering would help prevent food wastage. We felt bad at how much food we couldn‚Äôt eat. The restaurant on the R level was good for breakfast with representation of varied cultures. Ample types of food for people to decide what to eat. Pool bar - we came later in the day. Rooftop was clean with comfy lounges and couches. We had a couple of cocktails and some nibbles to watch the sun set.  Room COMFORTABLE BED! Slept really well. Soaker tub was appreciated and it helped me to wind down so I could sleep. Spacious bathroom. They stopped by and asked if we needed water. Appreciated  Maybe we can try the spa tomorrow‚Ä¶ Definitely would recommend!‚Ä¶

Had an amazing experience made even more memorable because of hotel staff service . We were checked in at the club lounge which was an experience in itself and the suite was one of the best ones I  had stayed at.  Food in the club lounge was always good and the room service always on time . Mr. Tamar took special care of us and made us feel at home. At front desk n Conceirage Ms. Christen was super kind and helpful and gave insight as to what we must visit and made arrangements for us for our trip to the Pyramids with guide and hotel car. At the pool bar , Mr.Walid Salim took good care of us. All in all from room cleanliness to staff service to club lounge experience, everything was spot on . Also the hotel is right on the nile so great views.

Wonderful experience at the fairmont. Beyond our thoughts expectations. Great attention to details. We also enjoyed the heated sky pool at the fairmont. People are so thoughtful. Thank you Walid, Mahmoud and all other whose names i forgot.

Celebrating my birthday in Cairo. The treatment provided by the rooftop pool bar staff was second to none. The surprise with cake and song was overwhelming,   The hotel standard and service level in general is higher than one could expect   Just a fantastic place to stay and the best choice celebrating the day

Fairmont is the Best hotel to stay in. Outstanding friendly staff. They get you what you need before you even ask. Ola and Ashrakat in the restaurant were amazing and super friendly. We would definitely stay in Fairmont Corniche el Nile on our next visit to Egypt.

Beautiful property. Went swimming on the top floor and had amazing service - especially from Walid. Thank you for making our stay so comfortable! Would come back to stay again the only the future anytime.

The Fairmont Nile city is the best hotel I‚Äôve ever been in!!!!!! The hotel rooms are amazing, the view is good, and the pool is amazingüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ!!! The buffet has excellent quality!!! and the server, Sunrise, was very very nice! I would highly recommend this hotel!!üòçüëçüëç  Aidan 9 yrs

Sky pool has the best view of Cairo that I‚Äôve seen. Good music, food and helpful staff. Walid Selem, Moustofa and the DJ made our afternoon at the pool very enjoyable. I‚Äôll be back next time I‚Äôm in town.

Wow- what an experience! Came for day-use of the Pool and Sauna and will definitely be staying here when I come back. Wonderful service and incredible gratitude staff. Monica at the spa is so sweet and helpful. Moustafa at the Sky Bar was amazing and shared stories and recommendations with us. Also he makes delicious drinks! Very grateful for the whole experience and will definitely be back. Also not to miss, the best shower of my life in the Cool Mist Experience Shower after hanging by the pool all day.

Were helpful and welcoming even for brown skinned people.  Very Very big suite rooms. Bathrooms needs upgrade but everything was available as a full fledged apartment. Staff was excellent and support  in everything a guests needs. Location was great. Great views of Nile with balconies.

I would like to say huge thank you to everyone in Cairo Trade Centre Hotel üòä  Where can I start with out forgetting anything / Anyone!  The team in Cairo Trade Centre are there purely to give the best Service ever to their guests during their Stay, nothing too much.
